overview: Thirty years after the fall of the Soviet Union, three generations of Ukrainian women relay their memories, variously sharp and hazy, of three distinct eras. A short documentary and triptych portrait, bittersweet in both content and context. Filmed in the year before Ukraine would have to fight anew for independence, the womenâ€™s memories of bygone times ring with devastating relevance, and their hopes for the future take on stinging new significance.
title: The Curtain
